PHRASE.LANG: 悪魔も認めるやり込み過ぎ称号！ 修羅認定書
악마도 인정하는 완전 폐인 칭호! 수라 인정서
Carnage Certificate: You've played too much!
惡魔也認定的沈迷稱號！ CARNAG認定書
惡魔也認定的沈迷稱號！ CARNAG認定書
Carnage Certificate: Even a demon can see you've played too much!
Carnage Certificate: You've played too much!
Certificat de Camage: Vous avez trop joué!
『魔界戦記ディスガイア３』において見事「修羅の国」に到達すると、あなたのやり込みっぷりを称え、なんと「魔立邪悪学園理事長 マオ」より表彰状が贈られる！「貴様は やり込みを極めんと 修羅の道を選び 数々の素晴らしい戦績をあげた よってここに修羅認定書を贈り 表彰すると共に 修羅様を名乗ることを許可する」魔立邪悪学園理事長 マオ[#Legal]

『마계전기 디스가이아3』에 있어서 훌륭히「수라의 나라」에 도달하면, 당신의 폐인다운 모습을 칭찬하고자 무려「마립 사악학원 이사장 마오」로부터 표창장을 받게 됩니다!「귀하는 최고의 폐인성과 수라의 길을 선택해 여러 가지 훌륭한 전투 성적을 거두었으므로 여기에 수라 인정서를 선사해 표창하며 수라님의 이름을 입에 올리는 것을 허락한다」마립 사악학원 이사장 마오[#Legal]

Once you have achieved the "Land of Carnage" in "Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice," you will be presented with a certificate of commendation by "Overlord Mao -- Dean of Evil Academy" himself! "You played for a long time, and chose the path of carnage, winning numerous brilliantly-fought battles along the way, so I hereby present you with this Certificate of Carnage. Along with this certificate, I bestow upon you the title of 'Master of Carnage.'" - Overlord Mao -- Dean of Evil Academy. [#Legal]
『魔界戰記 Disgaea』中順利到達「Land of Camage」後，居然得到「魔立邪惡學園理事長MAO」頒發表揚狀稱讚您的投入！「我表揚你全心投入，選擇CARNAGE之路，贏得眾多傑出戰績，因此頒發CARNAGE認定書的同時，也允許你擁有CARNAGE的名號」。魔立邪惡學園理事長 MAO[#Legal]
『魔界戰記 Disgaea』中順利到達「Land of Camage」後，居然得到「魔立邪惡學園理事長MAO」頒發表揚狀稱讚您的投入！「我表揚你全心投入，選擇CARNAGE之路，贏得眾多傑出戰績，因此頒發CARNAGE認定書的同時，也允許你擁有CARNAGE的名號」。魔立邪惡學園理事長 MAO[#Legal]

Once you have achieved the "Land of Carnage" in "Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice," you will be presented with a certificate of commendation by "Overlord Mao -- Dean of Evil Academy" himself! "You played for a long time, and chose the path of carnage, winning numerous brilliantly-fought battles along the way, so I hereby present you with this Certificate of Carnage. Along with this certificate, I bestow upon you the title of 'Master of Carnage.'" - Overlord Mao -- Dean of Evil Academy. [#Legal]

Once you have achieved the "Land of Carnage" in "Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice," you will be presented with a certificate of commendation by "Overlord Mao -- Dean of Evil Academy" himself! "You played for a long time, and chose the path of carnage, winning numerous brilliantly-fought battles along the way, so I hereby present you with this Certificate of Carnage. Along with this certificate, I bestow upon you the title of 'Master of Carnage.'" - Overlord Mao -- Dean of Evil Academy. [#Legal]

Une fois que tu as fini la "Land of Camage" dans "Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice", le doyen lui-même "Overlord Mao" te soumettra le certificat de recommandation. Tu as joué pendant longtemps, et tu as choisi le chemin de camage, gagnant de nombreux combats brillement combattus sur ta route, je te présente donc, le Certificat de Camage. Avec ce certificat, je t'accorde le titre de "Maître de Camage"- Overlord Mao- Dyen de l'Evil Academy.[#Legal]
